sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import './Adduser.css'; // Optional: your scoped styles export default function AddUserModal({ onClose, onSubmit }) { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name: '', email: '', }); const handleChange = (e) => { setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); onSubmit(formData); // Send data to parent }; return (

Add New User

); }
